title: xbox one offline showing im playing league of legends
body: when im offline on xbox and playing league on my computer its showing on my xbox one that im online league of legends how do i stop this from happening

replies.body: A recent Windows 10 update made some changes with the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) that might not be properly interacting with League.  Disabling that might get this fixed up for you.  Hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5lTJLXpN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-24T17:51:14.993+0000)
>
> A recent Windows 10 update made some changes with the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) that might not be properly interacting with League.  Disabling that might get this fixed up for you.  Hope that helps!

how do i disable this?
